name: Project AIDA
description: Ethan Williams left his job as a detective and continues to be haunted by his experience of his daughter’s death, the disappearance of his wife Jenny and the death of his daughter aida in a house fire. Ethan drinking in the bar is approached by his former Wife jenny and now Orion agent, revealing to Ethan that the crime scene was covered up and fabricated by Orion. Jenny informs Ethan to go outside of town in a motel to provide more information about this conspiracy and find the truth to what happened to his family.
